summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-seventh Avenue West, in the City of Seattle, from West Blaine Street to West Howe Street, by grading and curbing the same, and by the construction of concrete walks, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2337 of the City Council of the City of Seattle; and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
